resources.string: Due to Android limitations this type can\'t be copied to clipboard.

How to use: just open any app, for example the browser, press "Share", and choose "Share to Clipboard". Now just go to any text field, long-press, and in the pop-up menu click "Paste". That is it!

 If you Choose CONFESSION it will show Confession copied in small alert.
The application icon will be removed from the system\'s applications list.\nIn order to restore the icon, please uninstall and reinstall the app. \n* This may cause issues with some phone models.
Tap here to share with a different app
